name: The Fight for Humanity
description: In a world where fights with the undead are common, and food is scarce, sometimes the thing to be most afraid of is other people! Although a larger party means more guns to fight zombies with, it also means arguments! It means theft, it means wasting more supplies, and  it means death. In this fight to keep the human race alive, your goal is to bring as much people and supplies back to the apocalypse shelter as you can! Each member of the party that survives and the supplies are converted to points at the end of the game, and the higher your score, the more likely humanity is to continue to thrive. Can you successfully bring a full party back to the shelter? Or will their demands and constant bickering prove to be too much?
